ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Aggro (was Re: Dinosaur)
ygData.msgSnippet: My main is just level 52, so I don t go into the planes a whole lot. But when I do, it s with guildies in PoJ, or zone-in of PoI. I ve not had a lot of trouble
ygData.messageBody:
My main is just level 52, so I don't go into the planes a whole lot. But when I do, it's with guildies in PoJ, or zone-in of PoI. I've not had a lot of trouble in Innovation yet, but in PoJ, those rats get me ever time I med ( well, almost every time) hehe. So, I'm currently saving for a horse. The ppl I hunt with are tired of saving my butt, lol.

 alexander.jones@... wrote:

Sitting in plane of tactics when fighting a Gindan flayer split (this is a
normal exp mob, nothing special) and you will get 2 mobs doubling 800 on
your ass. So thats 3200 first round. If you survive this and dont get low hp
aggro and manage to get healed the attention is now on the healer who will
be quite pissed at you for beeing lame and sitting.

Plane of tactics is nowhere near an uber zone, its just a normal zone to exp
in and a lot of people are able to zone here and exp. Same thing would apply
to most pop zones. You just cant sit to med, its bad for you and the group
to do so.



-----Original Message-----
From: naslund19@... [mailto:naslund19@...]
Sent: den 12 mars 2003 16:09
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Aggro (was Re: Dinosaur)


> From: "Thunder Cat" <Thunder_Cat_4283@...>
>
> Speak for yourself. I hardly EVER get agrro. when I sit. And with KEI
> I
> hardly ever have to sit! In MY opinion, it is not worth spending a ton of
> money just so I can avoid getting agrro! Maybe it is to you, but
definitely
> not to me!

You are also lvl 40.  The rules change drastically when you get to 55+.  Try

sitting in ToV during a pull and see how fast you die.
